titleInfo.title: Letter, L.W. Youmans in Fairfax, S.C., to Mrs. E.A.R. Breck in Knoxville, Tenn. 1904 Apr. 18

mods.abstract: 1904 Apr. 18, L.W. Youmans, Planter and dealer in General Merchandise, Fairfax, S.C., to Mrs. E.A.R. Breck, Knoxville, Tenn. Thanks Elizabeth for sending him a copy of Lyman Draper's book, Lives of the House of King 's Mountain. Feels that it furnished material for other books, including Roosevelt's Winning of the West. Remarks that high prices have induced him to plant more cotton. Remembrance of Henry and Bessie Lenoir.
